Time seems to have flown by today.

content: [test]【Dialogue intro when Bond Level is 4 (less than 4 conversations)】
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Oh, it's you.
What are you up to? Mind if I tag along?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content: [test]Hello there! Is everything going well?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Hello! (smiling sweetly)
How was your day?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Good morning! (smile)
The first ray of sunlight in the morning falls on my body,
as if charging up the new day ahead.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]So, you've been looking for me quite a few times today?
Something interesting must have happened. (smile).
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content: [test]【Intro dialogue when Bond Level is 3-4 (less than 4 conversations)】
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Is it just my imagination?
Have I run into you many times today?
{PetPhrase}~
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]{开心}Every time I see you,
I'm reminded of the phrase "a beautiful chance encounter."
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Nice to meet you,
Even though I've lost count of how many times it's been today.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Don't worry about it, I love how you always come running to say hi to me.
You can drop by anytime, {PetPhrase}.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]You seem to really enjoy greeting me.
No, I actually quite like it.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]<color=#ca8f50>{Pnickname}</color>! {开心}
Did you come all this way just to say hi?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]We meet again! Must be fate.
Need anything?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test](微笑)Do you like taking afternoon naps?
Me? I'm more of a night owl, you know.
For me, everything's just getting started at noon.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]Good afternoon,
The way you were running just now made me think,
What a lively afternoon full of vitality, {PetPhrase}.
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content: [test]【Dialogue intro 5-7 times Bond Level 4】
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]We seem to have run into each other quite a few times today.
Perhaps... these weren't just chance encounters?
info: 通用引入语-0保底_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
[test]I'm calculating how many times we met today.
One plus two plus one equals... three?
（短暂停）Why was I counting this again?

content:
[test]Hi there! (smiling)
How have you been lately?
